de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.animation

Interface Animation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpriteSheetAnimation

    public interface Animation
    A generic animation which can be rendered onto a Screen or applied FrameBuffer.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Animation clone()
      Clones this animation.
      void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch, float x, float y, float width, float height, float delta, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      Renders this animation at the given position with specified dimensions.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch,
          float x,
          float y,
          float width,
          float height,
          float delta,
          com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Renders this animation at the given position with specified dimensions.
        Parameters:
        batch - the batch to use in order to render this animation
        x - the horizontal position of this animation on the screen
        y - the vertical position of this animation on the screen
        width - the width in pixel of this animation
        height - the height in pixel of this animation
        delta - the current frame delta

      • clone

        Animation clone()
        Clones this animation.
